title: Poc Procen Air vs Oakley ARO7: Is an Integrated Visor Helmet What You Need on Your Next Casual Group Ride?
content:
The POC Procen Air and Oakley Aro7 helmets blur the line between a modern aero road and a TT helmet but what are they like to actually use?

Read the full article at Poc Procen Air vs Oakley ARO7: Is an Integrated Visor Helmet What You Need on Your Next Casual Group Ride? on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
